title: Did a Russian asbestos company put Trump's face on its product?
subtitle: A Russian producer of asbestos shared with the social media a picture of his product with the stamp of Donald Trump's face and the text "approved by Donald Trump."
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A Russian asbestos company sealed the face of President Donald Trump on their product with the note "Acquainted by Donald Trump, the 45th President of the United States."
